# @notemine/core
Rust source code for **notemine** that compiles to WASM. 

# deps 
```
cargo install wasm-pack
```

# build
```
cargo clean
wasm-pack build --target web --release
```

# using js bindings
See [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@notemine/core)
